Santa_Rosa.Luther Burbank Center for the Arts: The Luther Burbank Center for the Arts (sometimes called the LBC, and also known as the Wells Fargo Center for the Arts from March 2005 – March 2016) is a performance venue located just north of Santa Rosa, California, by U.S. 101. The facility is owned and operated by the Luther Burbank Memorial Foundation, a non-profit arts organization established in 1979.
